mapper.select: select imageid, username, images.classifyid, classifyname, uptime, image from images, classify, user where images.classifyid = classify.classifyid and images.userid = user.userid and images.status = 1

select imageid, username, images.classifyid, classifyname, uptime, image from images, classify, user where images.classifyid = classify.classifyid and images.userid = user.userid and images.status = 0

select imageid, username, images.classifyid, classifyname, uptime, image from images, classify, user where images.classifyid = classify.classifyid and images.imageid = #{imageid} and images.userid = user.userid
mapper.insert: insert into `images`(userid, classifyid, uptime, image) values (#{userid}, #{classifyid}, #{uptime}, #{image})
mapper.update: update `images` set status = 1, classifyid = (select classifyid from classify where classifyname = #{classifyname}) where imageid = #{imageid};
